input.concept: Plataforma de e-learning con cursos, evaluaciones y certificados
input.requirements_yaml:
constraints:
- description: La plataforma debe ser compatible con navegadores web actuales (Chrome,
    Firefox, Safari)
  id: C001
  priority: High
- description: Implementación de un sistema de certificación que cumpla con las normativas
    educativas locales
  id: C002
  priority: Medium
- description: Restricciones presupuestarias limitan la adquisición de nuevas tecnologías
    no esenciales
  id: C003
  priority: High
description: La plataforma de e-learning ofrece cursos completos con materiales multimedia,
  incluyendo videos instructivos, textos detallados y evaluaciones interactivas. Los
  usuarios pueden avanzar a través del contenido a su propio ritmo y acceder a un
  sistema de certificación al finalizar cada curso. La plataforma está diseñada para
  ser accesible en múltiples dispositivos y ofrece una experiencia de aprendizaje
  personalizada, adaptándose según el progreso del usuario.
functional_requirements:
- description: Crear, editar y eliminar cursos
  id: FR001
  priority: High
- description: Agregar evaluaciones asociadas a los cursos
  id: FR002
  priority: High
- description: Generar certificados de finalización para usuarios que superen las
    evaluaciones
  id: FR003
  priority: Medium
- description: Permitir al usuario avanzar y retroceder en el contenido del curso
  id: FR004
  priority: High
- description: Ofrecer acceso a la plataforma desde dispositivos móviles e inteligentes
  id: FR005
  priority: High
- description: Implementar un sistema de búsqueda para cursos específicos
  id: FR006
  priority: Medium
- description: Permitir al usuario ver su historial de progreso y evaluaciones
  id: FR007
  priority: Medium
non_functional_requirements:
- description: La plataforma debe ser escalable para acomodar un aumento en el número
    de usuarios
  id: NFR001
  priority: High
- description: Garantizar alta disponibilidad y tolerancia a fallos del sistema
  id: NFR002
  priority: High
- description: Procesamiento seguro de datos personales de los usuarios
  id: NFR003
  priority: High
- description: Optimización de tiempos de carga para el acceso en dispositivos móviles
  id: NFR004
  priority: Medium
title: E-Learning Platform
input.product_vision:
product_name: E-Learning Platform
product_summary: The E-Learning Platform offers comprehensive, self-paced courses
  with rich multimedia content and interactive evaluations. It empowers users to earn
  formal certifications upon course completion, provides a personalized learning experience
  that adapts to their progress, and is accessible across various devices to ensure
  flexible learning.
target_users:
- Individual learners seeking flexible skill development and formal certification.
- Content creators or educators managing course materials.
value_proposition:
- Obtain recognized certifications through a flexible, self-paced learning environment.
- Access high-quality, multimedia-rich educational content anytime, anywhere.
- Validate learning through interactive evaluations and track personal progress effectively.
key_capabilities:
- Provide a comprehensive catalog of courses with multimedia content (video, text).
- Enable interactive evaluations and detailed progress tracking for users.
- Generate verifiable completion certificates compliant with local regulations.
- Offer multi-device access (web browsers, mobile) with optimized performance.
- Support course creation, editing, and management by administrators/educators.
- Implement a search functionality for discovering specific courses.
- Ensure secure processing of user personal data.
non_goals:
- Providing instructor-led live sessions or real-time tutoring.
- Functioning as a social networking platform for learners.
- Adopting non-essential, costly bleeding-edge technologies due to budget constraints.
- Serving as an enterprise-level Learning Management System (LMS) with extensive organizational
  administrative features beyond course content management.
success_metrics:
- User course completion and certification rates.
- User engagement (e.g., active course participation, time spent).
- Compliance with local educational certification standards.
- Platform availability and performance (e.g., uptime, mobile load times).
- Scalability to accommodate increasing user numbers.

output.architecture_yaml:
backend:
- Manages course content, evaluations, and certificates.
- Provides APIs for user interaction and administration.
- Handles user authentication and progress tracking.
- Implements search functionality for courses.
frontend:
- Web application for multi-device access.
- Displays course materials and interactive evaluations.
- User interface for progress tracking and certificate viewing.
- Responsive design for optimal mobile experience.
data:
- Database for course metadata, user profiles, and progress.
- Storage for evaluation results and certificate records.
- Secure storage for multimedia content assets.
integrations:
- Content Delivery Network (CDN) for media delivery.
- Email service for notifications and certificate delivery.
observability:
- Application logging and performance monitoring.
- Error tracking and alerting.
security:
- User authentication and authorization.
- Data encryption for personal and sensitive information.
- Compliance with data protection regulations.
